alert.note: Alert for Clay; Clinton; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:16PM CDT until June 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON...NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND WESTERN RAY COUNTIES... At 716 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holt, or near Lawson, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Excelsior Springs, Richmond, Lawson, Lathrop, Orrick, Holt, Crystal Lakes, Excelsior Estates, Woods Heights, Rayville, Homestead and Prathersville. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 29 and 38. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
